instruction: Extrapolate a plausible fantasy creature from the following description.
input: A creature with a humanoid body but the wings of a hawk
output: The creature had a humanoid body but its skin shimmered, reflecting the light of the moon like a shimmering mantle. Its movements were lithe and quick, its dark wings unfurling from its back in mere moments. It had the head, torso, and limbs of a human, but its wings were those of a hawk. It moved with the grace and agility of a soaring predator, its eyes ever darting and searching. Most strange of all were the glowing symbols on its forehead, symbols of a forgotten time and place, a mystery never to be revealed.
